description: An extension of at least one of the hist-nat (histNAT) simulations to the year 2100 following SSP2-45 solar and volcanic forcing. The future solar forcing data recommended for CMIP6 has a downward trend (Matthes et al., 2016).
keywords: DAMIP, Tier 3, ssp245, natural forcing only
rationale: To investigate effects of this declining solar forcing on future climate change projections.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2021 to the end of the 21st century
requirements.label: 2021-2100 80yrs

requirements.description: Impose changing volcanic forcing for RCP scenarios.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, future, 21st century, volcanic forcing
requirements.label: RCPVolcanic

requirements.description: Impose changing (natural) solar forcing for RCP scenarios.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, future, 21st century, solar forcing
requirements.label: RCPSolar

requirements.description: An ensemble of at least one simulation
requirements.keywords: minimum 1, at least 1, ensemble, run, simulation
requirements.label: MinimumOne

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
